snippet: Senator Lisa Murkowski, the Alaska Republican who has emerged as one of her party’s more moderate members in the Senate, said Wednesday that she supports same-sex marriage.
abstract: Senator Lisa Murkowski, the Alaska Republican who has emerged as one of her party’s more moderate members in the Senate, said Wednesday that she supports same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Alaska's Murkowski Becomes Third G.O.P. Senator to Support Gay Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
